questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and agriculture
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In a cornfield
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A sports event
B) A quiet street scene
C) A family gathering
D) A field of growing corn

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) People walking
B) Animals grazing
C) Corn plants
D) Buildings

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A cornfield
C) A person
D) A house

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Ocean waves
B) Trees and sky
C) Mountains
D) Skyscrapers

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A paved path
B) A river
C) A car
D) A bench

What is the relationship between the center and the background of the photo?
A) The cornfield is bordered by trees
B) The cornfield is next to a lake
C) The cornfield is surrounded by buildings
D) The cornfield is adjacent to a desert

What type of vegetation is depicted in the photo?
A) Wheat
B) Corn
C) Rice
D) Barley

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Overcast
B) Clear and blue
C) Rainy
D) Snowy

A) Sandy
B) Paved with stones
C) Covered in snow
D) Muddy

A) Red and orange
B) Blue and green
C) Black and white
D) Yellow and brown

What is the state of the corn plants in the photo?
A) Dying
B) Growing healthily
C) Harvested
D) Newly planted

A) Dirt path
B) Paved path with stones
C) Wooden path
D) River path

What is the lighting condition in the photo?
A) Dark and gloomy
B) Bright and sunny
C) Dim and shadowy
D) Artificially lit

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) From above
B) Eye level
C) From below
D) Aerial view

A) Dry and cracked
B) Moist and healthy
C) Covered in snow
D) Sandy

C) In the middle

A) Harvesting
B) Planting

D) Irrigation

A) Buildings

A) Animals
B) Corn plants

D) Buildings

A) Rainy
B) Clear and sunny
C) Snowy
D) Cloudy

D) Industrial
